Amitabh Bachchan (akpọ [əmɪˈt̪ɑːbʱ ˈbətːʃən]; amụrụ dị ka Amitabh Shrivastav;  11 October 1942 ) bụ onye omere India, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye ọbịa telivishọn, onye na-agụ egwu oge ụfọdụ na onye bụbu onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ama ama maka ọrụ ya na Hindi

A na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe ịga nke ọma na ndị nwere mmetụta na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke sinima India.  Akpọrọ ya dị ka Shahenshah nke Bollywood (n'ihe banyere ihe nkiri 1988 ya bụ Shahenshah), Sadi ka Mahanayak (Hindi maka "Onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke narị afọ"), Star nke Millennium, ma ọ bụ Big B.  N'ime 1970-1980s, ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị na ihe nkiri India;  onye isi France François Truffaut kpọrọ ya "ụlọ ọrụ otu onye."￼
